name: zhu yue
description:
Enter a black and white world where you play as a bamboo cutter in the harsh winter night. Soak in the atmosphere and music as you casually plant and harvest bamboo, feel the roaring winter winds, explore the endless world for relics. 

Try to find all 12 easter egg relics! 

Z to swing your axe, X to plant bamboo, left and right keys to move
